verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, Name above all names, Beautiful Savior, Glorious Lord, Emmanuel, God is with us, Blessed Redeemer, Living Word.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Anointed above His companions, Man of Sorrows, Lover of Righteousness, Messiah, Life-giving Spirit, Mighty Delivâ€™rer, Priest and King.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I Am, Light of the Gentiles, Lord God Almighty, Prince of Peace, El Shaddai, God is Sufficient, Shepherd of Souls, King of Kings.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Lily of the Valley, Son of David, Rose of Sharon, The Alpha and the Omega, Seed of Jesse, Morning Star.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Jesus, our Intercessor, Promised Messiah, Bread of Life, The Giver of Living Water, Mighty Baptizer, Son of God.{/lang-eng}
